channel.title: Spawning Objects (Like Rocks)

item.title: Spawning Objects (Like Rocks)
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

The x/y calculation is:

scene_placement_x = x - (scene_center_block_x - 6) << 3
scene_placement_y = y - (scene_center_block_y - 6) << 3

Read full topic

item.title: Spawning Objects (Like Rocks)
item.dc:creator: @em0bunny em0bunny
item.description:
@em0bunny wrote:

Hey so I’ve got Reflection Cheat Client and Im trying to make a new command that spawns objects except it spawns the same object in every space for 50 spaces. So basically spawn a square with 250 objects inside of it.

Heres the code for “Object”
} else if (text.startsWith(“object”)) {
int x = getField(“baseX”).getInt© + (player.x -6 >> 7);

            int y = getField("baseY").getInt(c) + (player.y -6 >> 7);

player.x represents your player ingame im pretty sure. I tried playing around with the -6 >> 7 to make it work but whenever I change that it breaks the object commands and it wont spawn anything. So im hoping you guys could help me with this.
“c” = client and Im not entirely sure what “base” represents, sorry. :c

Read full topic
